```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Loading Data

```{r}
df <- read.csv("cleaned data/data_2022_2023_cleaned.csv")
```

## Filtering USA Data

```{r}
df_usa <- df[df['Country'] == 'USA',]
df_usa <- df_usa %>%
  mutate(LastName = toupper(LastName), FirstName = toupper(FirstName), FullName = paste(LastName, ' ', FirstName))
```

```{r}
# competitions 
df_usa %>%
  select(Competition) %>%
  distinct()
```

```{r}
# athletes represented 
df_usa %>%
  filter(Competition == "2023 52nd FIG Artistic Gymnastics World Championships") %>%
  select(FullName) %>%
  distinct()
```


## Scoring Trends for Femal US Athletes 

```{r}
# making data frame
df_usa_women <- df_usa[df_usa['Gender'] == 'w',]
```

```{r}
df_usa_women %>%
  select(FullName) %>%
  distinct()
```


```{r}
df_usaw_vt <- df_usa_women %>%
  filter(stringr::str_like(Apparatus,'VT%') & Rank <= 5)
```


```{r}
ggplot(df_usaw_vt, mapping = aes(x = as.Date(Date, ), y = Score, color = FullName)) +
  geom_point()
```
